title: KFC is selling a huge 80 piece popcorn chicken bucket for under £6
text:

Just when we thought we'd seen it all, KFC go and announce that they're now selling gigantic, 80-piece buckets of their beloved popcorn chicken.

And despite holding 80 separate pieces of chicken, they're still pretty cheap, setting you back just £5.99 for the bucket - that's even cheaper than a Zinger box meal.

Unveiled today on deals forum HotUKDeals, fried chicken fans were left mesmerised when they turned up to their local store to see banners revealing the impressive offer.

While it's certainly genuine - with an array of customers already sharing photos of their receipts - there's no word on whether or not it's nationwide.

We've contacted KFC for a comment about the offer, and will update this article if we hear back.

(Image: HotUKDeals)

The post on the deals forum has caused a lot of excitement amongst fast food fans, although some people are wondering how the staff count out the near 100 pieces of chicken, saying "Do you have to wait ages whilst they count out 80 popcorn chicken?" and "Someone needs to actually buy this and count. Then cause a fuss saying it’s false advertising when there’s less than 80pcs."

Meanwhile, others are finding even more ways to save money, with James Dougal saying how he used his points on the KFC Colonel Club app to get the 80-piece bucket for under £1. He said, "Was even better for me....used my £5 voucher to make it 99p!"

(Image: HotUKDeals)

But the popcorn chicken offer isn't the only deal going on at KFC right now, with the chain also announcing an array of other discounts yesterday, including a hot wings bucket with 20 wings for £5.99, two fillet burgers for £6 (usually £7.98), a 12 piece dipping boneless feast for £16 (usually £18.99), and finally, a boneless banquet for £5.49 (usually £6.49).
description: Popcorn chicken fans... prepare yourselves, as you can now get an entire 80-piece bucket of the stuff at KFC
